com.joffrey_bion.compression.huffman.semi_adaptive.SHTree

    Package Description
    com.joffrey_bion.compression.huffman.semi_adaptive  

    • Uses of SHTree in com.joffrey_bion.compression.huffman.semi_adaptive

      Methods in com.joffrey_bion.compression.huffman.semi_adaptive that return SHTree 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static SHTree SHTree.buildTree(Map<Character,Integer> frequencies)
      Uses the given character frequencies to build a Huffman tree.
      SHTree SHTree.getOne()
      Returns the "1" son of this tree.
      SHTree SHTree.getZero()
      Returns the "0" son of this tree.
      Methods in com.joffrey_bion.compression.huffman.semi_adaptive with parameters of type SHTree 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int SHTree.compareTo(SHTree tree)
      Compares this tree to the specified tree using their frequencies: The frequency of a leaf is given in the constructor SHTree(Character, int).
      Constructors in com.joffrey_bion.compression.huffman.semi_adaptive with parameters of type SHTree 
      Constructor and Description
      SHTree(SHTree zero, SHTree one)
      Creates a new node with the given sons.
